    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Allocate
    Entity class that represents the allocation of a specific permission to a user in the car rental system.
    AllocateController
    REST Controller for managing user permission allocations.
    AllocateConverter
    Converter class for transforming Allocate entities between model and DTO representations.
    AllocateList
    DTO class representing an allocation of a permission to a user.
    AllocateRead
    DTO class used for reading allocation information.
    AllocateRepository
    Repository interface for handling CRUD operations on the 'Allocate' entity.
    AllocateSave
    DTO class used for saving allocation information.
    AllocateService
    Service class for managing car rental allocations.
    ApplicationExceptionHandler
     
    AutoBerloApplication
     
    AutoNotFoundException
     
    Car
    Entity class that represents a car in the car rental system.
    CarController
     
    CarConverter
    Converter class for handling transformations between Car entities and their corresponding DTOs.
    CarList
    DTO class representing a car in a list or overview format.
    CarRead
    DTO class for reading the details of a car.
    CarRepository
    Repository interface for handling CRUD operations on the 'Car' entity.
    CarSave
    DTO class for saving a new car.
    CarService
    Service class responsible for managing car-related operations.
    ExceptionHandling
     
    ExceptionResponse
    DTO class for exception response.
    GlobalVariable
    This class defines global constants for different price categories.
    JwtAccessDeniedHandler
    Custom implementation of AccessDeniedHandler that is triggered when a user tries to access a resource without the required permissions.
    JwtAuthenticationEntryPoint
    Custom implementation of Http403ForbiddenEntryPoint that is triggered when an unauthenticated user attempts to access a protected resource.
    JwtAuthorizationFilter
    Custom filter for handling JWT-based authorization in HTTP requests.
    JWTTokenProvider
    JWT Token Provider for generating, validating, and managing JWT tokens.
    Loan
    Entity class that represents a loan (car rental) in the system.
    LoanController
     
    LoanConverter
    Converter class responsible for transforming Loan entities to their corresponding DTOs and vice versa.
    LoanList
    DTO class for listing loans.
    LoanRead
    DTO class for reading loan details.
    LoanRepository
    Repository interface for handling CRUD operations on the 'Loan' entity.
    LoanSave
    DTO class for saving loan details.
    LoanService
    Service class for managing car loan (rental) operations.
    LoginRequest
    DTO class for login request.
    PasswordEncoderConfig
    Configuration class for setting up a password encoder in the Spring Security context.
    Permission
    Enumeration representing the various permissions available in the system.
    PermissionCollector
    A custom implementation of UserDetails that is used to collect and provide user permissions for Spring Security authentication and authorization.
    SecurityConfiguration
    Security configuration class that sets up authentication, authorization, and JWT-based security for the application.
    SpringContext
    Utility class to access Spring-managed beans from non-Spring managed classes.
    SwaggerConfiguration
    Configuration class for setting up Swagger documentation for the API.
    User
    Represents a user in the system.
    UserController
     
    UserConverter
    Converter class for transforming User entities to DTOs and vice versa.
    UserList
    DTO class for listing users.
    UserNotFoundException
     
    UserRead
    DTO class for reading user information.
    UserRepository
    Repository interface for handling CRUD operations on the 'User' entity.
    UserSave
    DTO class for saving user information.
    UserService
    Service class for managing User-related operations, including user creation, retrieval, update, permission fetching, and authentication integration.
